type.name: org.gradle.play.PlayApplicationBinarySpec
type.description: Represents a binary artifact that is the result of building a Play application software component.

method.name: getAssets
method.description:
A buildable object representing the public assets that will be included in the assets jar file.

returns:the PublicAssets for this binary

method.name: getAssetsJarFile
method.description:
The assets jar file produced for this binary.

returns:the assets jar file

method.name: getClasses
method.description:
A buildable object representing the class files and resources that will be included in the application jar file.

returns:the JvmClasses for this binary

method.name: getJarFile
method.description:
The application jar file produced for this binary.

returns:the application jar file

method.name: getTargetPlatform
method.description:
The PlayPlatform this binary is built for.

returns:platform for this binary

property.name: assets
property.description:
A buildable object representing the public assets that will be included in the assets jar file.

returns:the PublicAssets for this binary

property.name: assetsJarFile
property.description:
The assets jar file produced for this binary.

returns:the assets jar file

property.name: classes
property.description:
A buildable object representing the class files and resources that will be included in the application jar file.

returns:the JvmClasses for this binary

property.name: jarFile
property.description:
The application jar file produced for this binary.

returns:the application jar file

property.name: targetPlatform
property.description:
The PlayPlatform this binary is built for.

returns:platform for this binary
